title: Miss Me (feat. ABRA)
lyrics:
If I stayed away
I'd go back on my word cause you know I need you, baby
I'd cry "Please, baby"
I'd fold and freeze, baby
I know all that it takes to take you over, baby
I know all that it makes to see you glisten in sweat

I'll taste curse on your lips if you don't give into me, baby

Let me be the thing you won't regret

Let me be the thing you won't regret



'Cause if you miss me, baby

You're gonna miss me, yeah

'Cause if you miss me, baby

You're gonna miss everything, ohh



Hey, yeah, yeah-yeah

Yeah-yeah, yeah-yeah, mhm



I can show you the world

I just open my arms

You just open your eyes

And everything will be alright

Run away with me

Let's go to the sea
